players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Oh no, Bob is dead! I was hoping the detective would investigate him to confirm his innocence. Who should we look at first?"
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
Charlie: "Alice, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so openly? This seems risky unless you're absolutely certain."
You: "I am absolutely certain. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. We must vote her out to win."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote Alice!"

Charlie: "We have two players claiming to be detective and accusing each other. One of them must be lying. Alice made her accusation first and seemed very confident, but Diana's counter-claim is equally strong. I need more information before deciding."

players.name: Bob

players.name: Diana

Day 1 begins.
